entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
